name: Comfy Cat Ear Headphones (with built-in purring sounds)
description: Block out distractions (or pretend to) with these adorable headphones.

name: Self-Watering Desk Herb Garden Kit
description: Grow your own tiny garden without ever leaving your chair. Perfect for forgetting to water something small.

name: Giant Stress Ball Globe
description: The world is in your hands (literally) with this oversized stress reliever. Great for squeezing away anxieties (or geographical challenges).

name: Coloring Book for Adults with Inspirational Quotes (Mostly About Taking Breaks)
description: Unleash your inner child and maybe find some motivation hidden amongst the swirls.

name: Mini Arcade Cabinet with Retro Games
description: Relive your youth with classic games. Who needs work when you can pixelatedly battle aliens?

name: Executive Eye Mask with Built-in Bluetooth Speaker for Nature Sounds
description: Take a power nap anywhere with this luxurious mask. Don't forget to mute your microphone for important calls.

name: Pre-Chopped Fruit and Veggie Trays
description: Healthy snacking made easy! (Except for washing the container, which is a future you problem).

name: Soap Dispensing Dish Scrubber with Silly Sayings
description: Washing dishes is more fun with surprise messages! ("You got this!" or "Maybe order takeout?")

name: Comfy Clothes That Look Business Casual on Zoom
description: Maintain video call professionalism from the comfort of your pajamas. Just angle the camera carefully.

name: One-Button Remote Control for Streaming Services
description: Because who needs to navigate menus when you can just endlessly scroll.

name: Subscription Box of Pre-Made Meal Kits with Only 3 Steps (Because Cooking Shouldn't Be Complicated)
description: Pre-made meal kits with only 3 steps for when cooking seems like too much effort.

name: Expandable Infinity Cube Fidget Toy
description: Click, clack, and distract yourself to infinity and beyond.

name: Self-Cleaning Vacuum Robot Named "Roomba the Distractionator"
description: Delegate cleaning chores while you, uh, supervise very closely.

name: Subscription Box of Artisanal Exotic Snacks
description: Explore the world (from your couch) with surprise deliveries of delicious (and possibly procrastination-inducing) treats.
